intro: I'm Willian, a career changer currently retraining as a Web & WebApp Developer at Syntax Institut.
My focus is modern frontend development with React, clear UI structure, and solid UX.
Projects like ContainerHub, Pokémon WebApp, and Toytopia show my progress and learning curve.

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a career changer with strong motivation for frontend development and UX. During my retraining as a Web & WebApp Developer at Syntax Institut, I work on modern React projects with clear architecture, clean styling, and understandable UI flows. Projects like ContainerHub (React/Tailwind + Strapi API), the Pokémon WebApp, and Toytopia help me practice API integration, state management, and UI systems.
